channel.title: HOME on Mart Jürisoo
channel.description: Recent content in HOME on Mart Jürisoo

item.title: International Football Results Database
item.description: This is a database of every international football result ever. Or quite close to that. I created it before the 2016 World Cup when I couldn't find a simply formatted results database. So now there is one. And it's updated monthly. Now it is one of the most popular datasets on Kaggle. If you have a question or a comment, or want to contribute, you can do so on Kaggle or on GitHub.
